place: Via S. Nicolo 30, IIÂ°, Trieste, Austria
author: James Joyce
text: Dear Mr Grant Richards, I am sending you by this post the story Two Gallants. It is to be inserted between After the Race and The BoardingHouse. I am sending it to you so that time may be saved in case you think of bringing out the book soon. Faithfully yours Jas A Joyce.
